'''Geoculus Resonance Stone''' is a consumable [[gadget]] that can be used to search for nearby [[Geoculus|Geoculi]]. It can be created through [[alchemy]] after using the [[Instructions: Geoculus Resonance Stone|instructions]] obtained by reaching [[Reputation]] Level 2 in [[Liyue]].

{{Transclude|Oculus Resonance Stone|resonance stone intro|section=1}}
<!---
'''Note''': If you enter another player's world in [[Co-Op Mode]], it either appears to search for Dendroculi based on what's in your world or just won't find any (and will display the animation that none are found). Since none will be found, it won't be consumed.
--->

==Descriptions==
{{Description|An exquisite stone plate that imitates a certain mysterious quality of the [[Geo]] [[Statues of The Seven]], causing it to lead people to the location of [[Geoculi]]. Elemental [[Oculi]] represent the lost power of the Statues of The Seven - perhaps offering this-power-back to the statues also has significance for the lands that the gods watch over.|[[Archive]]}}
